enum GBrowserSelectionFlags

flags returned by selection processing.

Enumeration values:
SELECT_SENSOR_BIT   found a sensor.
SELECT_ANCHOR_BIT   found a anchor.
SELECT_COLLISION_BIT   found some collision.
SELECT_DRAG_SENSOR_BIT   found a sensor which needs a mouse drag.
